welcome_message_body: Welcome to Al Khubar, a city known for its beautiful coastline, vibrant markets, and rich cultural heritage. We hope you enjoy your stay and take the time to explore all that this charming city has to offer.

restaurants.name: Shathrat Cafe (شذرات كافيه)
restaurants.description: Shathrat Cafe (شذرات كافيه) is a café located in Khobar.

restaurants.name: Golden Gate Restaurant (مطعم جولدن جيت)
restaurants.description: Golden Gate Restaurant (مطعم جولدن جيت) is a lebanese restaurant located in Khobar.
restaurants.address: Prince Abdulilah Street (Prince Majid St), Al Khobar 34611

restaurants.name: Shekhdar (شيخدار)
restaurants.description: Shekhdar (شيخدار) is a iraqi restaurant located in Khobar.

restaurants.description: Raising Cane’s (ريزينج كينز) is a fried chicken joint located in Khobar.

restaurants.name: Dunkin' (دانكن)
restaurants.description: Dunkin' (دانكن) is a donut shop located in Khobar.
